Plot: A laconic, chain-smoking barber blackmails his wife's boss and lover for money to invest in dry cleaning, but his plan goes terribly wrong.
Title: The Man Who Wasn't There
Actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Frances McDormand, Michael Badalucco, James Gandolfini
tomatoConsensus: Stylish but emotionally distant, The Man Who Wasn't There is a clever tribute to the film noir genre.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 24 wins & 41 nominations.
